T02D1268:28b-1: shr'i he badzra ratna pra lo ke s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D1268:28b-3: dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba /
T02D1268:28b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1268:28b-5: he ru ka dang bdag med bcas //
T02D1268:28b-7: de 'dod phyir na de sgrub thabs //
T02D1268:28b-8: de don gnyer la sgron 'di bri //
T02D1268:28b-9: chags med byang chub sems dang ldan //
T02D1268:28b-10: dbang thob blo ldan lung blangs pas //
T02D1268:28b-11: dur khrod la sogs gnas bde bar //
T02D1268:28b-12: rnal 'byor brtson pas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1268:28b-13: tho rangs byams pas mal nas langs //
T02D1268:28b-14: gdong la sogs pa dis bkrus nas //
T02D1268:28b-15: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i stan la 'dug / bdud rtsi'i
T02D1268:28b-16: ri lu lce la gzhag / snying rjes ma rnams
T02D1268:28b-17: gzung byas la // zhal brgyad nga rgyal bdag bsgoms te //
T02D1268:28b-18: rakshas sa sbyang gnas bsrung ba //
T02D1268:28b-19: me ri dra gur brtan par bsgom //
T02D1268:28b-20: he ru ka yi snying ga ru //
T02D1268:28b-21: bam dang ram las gsal bar ni //
T02D1268:28b-22: padma nyi ma dmar po bsgom //
T02D1268:28b-23: de steng h'um nag 'od zer lngas //
T02D1268:29a-0: @29a * // phyogs bcur spros pa bskul dang sbyang //
T02D1268:29a-1: byas nas thams cad mkha' la bzhugs //
T02D1268:29a-2: bla ma sangs rgyas rang dag lha //
T02D1268:29a-3: gsal bsgoms lus sprul phyag bya'o //
T02D1268:29a-4: de yang 'og nas ston pa yi //
T02D1268:29a-5: bcom ldan sku mdog phyag dang rgyan //
T02D1268:29a-6: phyag mtshan bcas pa bzhugs pa ni //
T02D1268:29a-7: bdag med yum dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1268:29a-8: de mdun goo r'i nag mo ni //
T02D1268:29a-9: byang chub sems dkar ri bong can //
T02D1268:29a-10: g-yas na tsoo r'i dmar mo yang //
T02D1268:29a-12: rgyab na ser mo be t'a l'i //
T02D1268:29a-13: lhung bzed chu bzang bkang ba 'bul //
T02D1268:29a-14: g-yon na ljang gu ghasma r'i //
T02D1268:29a-15: dri bzang thod pa bkang pa 'bul //
T02D1268:29a-16: byang shar pukka s'i sngon mo //
T02D1268:29a-17: sha lngas thod pa bkang ba 'bul //
T02D1268:29a-18: me na mdog dkar sha ba r'i //
T02D1268:29a-19: ro ldan btung ba sna tshogs 'bul //
T02D1268:29a-21: da ma ru sgrog sgra rnams 'bul //
T02D1268:29a-22: rlung na do mb'i sna tshogs gzugs //
T02D1268:29a-23: phyag rgya bsnol nas mchod pa 'bul //
T02D1268:29a-24: bla ma mi bskyod spyi bor bzhugs //
T02D1268:29a-25: gsal bar brtan par legs bsgoms la //
T02D1268:29a-26: snying ga'i sa bon spro bsdu las //
T02D1268:29a-27: phyi yi lha mo mchod pa'i tshogs //
T02D1268:29a-28: yon chab me tog spos la sogs //
T02D1268:29a-29: rab gnas le'u'i snags kyis mchod //
T02D1268:29a-30: sa bon spros la goo r'i'i tshogs //
T02D1268:29a-31: bshams dang gnas nas byon pa dang //
T02D1268:29a-32: mdun na gnas pa'i rim pa yis //
T02D1268:29a-33: bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga 'bul //
T02D1268:29a-34: gtso bo'i sa bon gyis bskul nas //
T02D1268:29a-35: dom b'i gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul //
T02D1268:29a-36: mchod pa'i lha mo thams cad kyang //
T02D1268:29a-37: spros pa de dag gnas nas bsdu //
T02D1268:29a-38: de nas de dag mdun du yang //
T02D1268:29a-39: pus btsugs thal sbyar 'jigs sems kyis //
T02D1268:29a-40: thog med dus nas deng dus su //
T02D1268:29a-41: 'khor bas 'khor bar bsags pa'i sdig / bgyis dang bgyid du stsal ba dang //
T02D1268:29a-42: yi rang bshags shing slan chad bsdam //
T02D1268:29a-43: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D1268:29a-44: rang rgyal nyan thos so so yi //
T02D1268:29a-45: skye bo'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D1268:29a-46: gsum la skyabs dang sems gnyis bskyed //
T02D1268:29a-47: bskul dang gsol bdag kyang gdab //
T02D1268:29a-48: thams cad byang chub chen por bsdo //
T02D1268:29b-0: de nas byams @29b dang snying rje dang //
T02D1268:29b-1: dga' dang btang snyoms yun rings bsgom //
T02D1268:29b-2: de nyid gsum dang mu: brjod pas //
T02D1268:29b-3: mdun gyi spyan drangs gnas su gshegs //
T02D1268:29b-4: chos rnams stong par shes byas la //
T02D1268:29b-5: blo gnas pa la sngags 'di brjod //
T02D1268:29b-6: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham //
T02D1268:29b-7: brjod pas gzung ba'i chos rnams kun //
T02D1268:29b-8: rmi lam mig 'phrul smig rgyu dang //
T02D1268:29b-9: chu zla mig yor sgyu ma tsam //
T02D1268:29b-10: sems snang tsam las yod ma yin //
T02D1268:29b-11: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1268:29b-12: brjod pas sems snang de dag kun //
T02D1268:29b-13: rdul dang du ba khug rna sprin //
T02D1268:29b-14: skyon bral ston ka'i nyi phyed kyi //
T02D1268:29b-15: nam mkha'i dkyil ltar sems gzhag bya //
T02D1268:29b-16: chos nyid spros dang bral ba las //
T02D1268:29b-17: smon lam byams pas 'gro ba dran //
T02D1268:29b-18: nam mkha'i dkyil du ram dang h'um //
T02D1268:29b-20: de nas h'um las byung ba yi //
T02D1268:29b-21: sna tshogs rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang //
T02D1268:29b-22: ra ba gur dang bla re dang //
T02D1268:29b-24: de nas ae las chos kyi dbyings //
T02D1268:29b-25: chos 'byung gru gsum nam mkha' mnyam //
T02D1268:29b-26: bsgoms pa'i nang du yam ram bam //
T02D1268:29b-27: lam bzhi sngo dmar dkar dang ser //
T02D1268:29b-28: yam zhu sngon po gzhu yi dbyibs //
T02D1268:29b-29: rlung gi dkyil 'khor ba dan ldan //
T02D1268:29b-30: de steng ram las gru gsum dmar //
T02D1268:29b-31: me yi dkyil 'khor ram gyis mtshan //
T02D1268:29b-32: de steng bam las zlum po dkar //
T02D1268:29b-33: chu yi dkyil 'khor bum pas mtshan //
T02D1268:29b-34: de steng lam las grub bzhi ser //
T02D1268:29b-35: sa yi dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan //
T02D1268:29b-36: sems kyi snang bas de rnams zhu //
T02D1268:29b-37: snang ba mched pas gzhal yas grub //
T02D1268:29b-38: rin po che las grub pa yi //
T02D1268:29b-39: zur bzhi sgo bzhi logs bzhi pa //
T02D1268:29b-40: rta babs bzhi dang ka ba brgyad //
T02D1268:29b-41: mchod pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes //
T02D1268:29b-42: chos kyi 'khor lo ri dgas gdugs //
T02D1268:29b-43: ba dan dril bu 'phan la sogs //
T02D1268:29b-44: sangs rgyas mang po'i snang bas khyab //
T02D1268:29b-45: dra ba dra phyed tva ra na //
T02D1268:29b-46: bum pa rdo rje phreng ba dang //
T02D1268:29b-47: sgo khyud zla phyed rdo rje mdzes //
T02D1268:29b-48: dur khrod brgyad na mtsho brgyad klu //
T02D1268:29b-49: shing brgyad zhing skyong gdan mgo brgyad //
T02D1268:29b-50: phyogs skyong chung ma bu 'khor brgyad //
T02D1268:29b-51: steng na lha brgyad lha yi 'khor //
T02D1268:29b-52: mchod rten brgyad dang rnal 'byor tshogs //
T02D1268:30a-1: bya dang gcan gzan sna tshogs sprul //
T02D1268:30a-2: sha za gdug pa ro yi tshogs //
T02D1268:30a-3: shar sogs sgo yi logs rim par //
T02D1268:30a-4: glu ma gar ma yon chab ma //
T02D1268:30a-5: me tog spos dang mar me ma //
T02D1268:30a-6: dri chab zhal zas sgra sna tshogs //
T02D1268:30a-7: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos //
T02D1268:30a-8: rgyan phreng ma rnams sna tshogs mdog / de nang dkar ser dmar dang ljang //
T02D1268:30a-9: gzhal yas dbus ni mthing ga 'bar //
T02D1268:30a-10: rdo rje ra ba padmar ldan //
T02D1268:30a-11: ge sar bdud bzhi nyi mas mnan //
T02D1268:30a-12: pad ma brgyad la lha brgyad bri //
T02D1268:30a-13: snying gar zla bas mnan pa'o //
T02D1268:30a-14: mdzes pa'i gzhal yas de nang gi / dbus kyi bdud bzhi'i nyi steng du //
T02D1268:30a-15: h'um dang aam las 'og dang steng //
T02D1268:30a-18: thod pa gri gug phyag mtshan ma //
T02D1268:30a-19: sa bon gnas pa spro bsdus pas //
T02D1268:30a-20: thams cad gcig tu gyur pa las //
T02D1268:30a-21: zhal brgyad yum dang kha sbyar ba //
T02D1268:30a-22: 'og gzhi gsal bar bsgom par bya //
T02D1268:30a-23: chags can bskyab phyir thugs rje yis //
T02D1268:30a-24: bdag nyid thugs ka'i sa bon las //
T02D1268:30a-25: phyogs bcur sangs rgyas gtsug tu byon //
T02D1268:30a-26: thugs kar sa bon so sor gnas //
T02D1268:30a-27: aom padma su kham dha ra ma h'a r'a ga
T02D1268:30a-28: datta tsa tur a'a nanda bha ga bi shva h'um
T02D1268:30a-29: h'um h'um ka r+yam ku ru shva me /
T02D1268:30a-30: padma sngags kyis byin gyis brlab //
T02D1268:30a-31: de nas rdo rje byin gyis brlab //
T02D1268:30a-32: aom badzra ma h'a dve sha tsa tur a'a nanda
T02D1268:30a-33: d'a ya ka kha ga mu kha ae ka ra
T02D1268:30a-34: so n'a tha h'um h'um h'um ka r+yam ku ru
T02D1268:30a-35: shva me / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa
T02D1268:30a-36: nu r'a ga ta badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma
T02D1268:30a-37: shva me / ko& ham / de ni sbyor ba dang po yin //
T02D1268:30a-38: de nas rjes su chags pa yis //
T02D1268:30a-39: shar sogs tshangs sogs snying ga ru //
T02D1268:30a-40: gam tsam bam gham pam sham lam dam //
T02D1268:30a-41: de nas phyogs mtshams rnams su babs //
T02D1268:30a-42: shar du gam yig gsal ba las //
T02D1268:30a-43: a'a li nyis 'gyur las zla ba'i //
T02D1268:30a-44: dkyil 'khor me long ye shes dang //
T02D1268:30a-45: steng du k'a li nyis 'gyur las //
T02D1268:30a-46: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid //
T02D1268:30a-47: gam gyur gri gug nag po la //
T02D1268:30a-48: zla ba sa bon so sor rtog / sa bon sprul sbyang gcig gyur pa //
T02D1268:30a-49: bya ba nan tan ye shes yin //
T02D1268:30a-50: goo r'i bzhengs pa'i sku de ni //
T02D1268:30a-51: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
T02D1268:30b-0: sngon du @30b bsgoms pa'i gtso bo dang //
T02D1268:30b-1: 'og gi lha mo bdun po yang //
T02D1268:30b-2: de bzhin ye shes lnga yi sku //
T02D1268:30b-3: rnal 'byor pa yis brtan par bsgom //
T02D1268:30b-4: shar du gri gug las byung ba'i //
T02D1268:30b-5: tshangs pa'i steng na goo r'i nag / g-yas na gri gug g-yon na nya //
T02D1268:30b-6: gzugs kyi phung po rang bzhin bsgom //
T02D1268:30b-7: lho ru dbang po'i steng gnas dmar //
T02D1268:30b-8: da ma ru las tsoo r'i bzhengs //
T02D1268:30b-9: da ma ru g-yas phag pa g-yon //
T02D1268:30b-10: tshor ba'i phung po'i rang bzhin bsgom //
T02D1268:30b-11: nub tu bam las be t'a l'i //
T02D1268:30b-12: gser mdog nye dbang gdan la bzhugs //
T02D1268:30b-13: g-yas na rus sbal thod pa g-yon //
T02D1268:30b-14: 'du shes phung po'i rang bzhin bsgom //
T02D1268:30b-15: byang du gham las ghasma r'i //
T02D1268:30b-16: drag po'i steng na mar kata mdog / sprul g-yas phyag g-yon thod pa 'dzin //
T02D1268:30b-17: 'du byed phung po'i rang bzhin bsgom //
T02D1268:30b-18: byang shar pam las seng ge las //
T02D1268:30b-19: pukka s'i sngo gshin rje'i steng //
T02D1268:30b-20: g-yas na seng ge dgra sta g-yon //
T02D1268:30b-21: sa yi khams kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1268:30b-22: me ru sham dang dge slong las //
T02D1268:30b-23: sha ba r'i dkar gnod sbyin gdan //
T02D1268:30b-24: g-yas na dge slong gsil byed g-yon //
T02D1268:30b-25: chu yi khams kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1268:30b-26: srin por lam dang 'khor lo las //
T02D1268:30b-27: gtum mo mkha' mdog srin po mnan //
T02D1268:30b-28: g-yas na 'khor lo thong gshol g-yon //
T02D1268:30b-29: me yi khams kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1268:30b-30: rlung du dam dang rdo rje las //
T02D1268:30b-31: dam b'i kha dog sna tshogs te //
T02D1268:30b-32: rdo rje g-yas la sdigs mdzub g-yon //
T02D1268:30b-33: rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin bsgo ma //
T02D1268:30b-34: lha mo de rnams spyan gsum ma //
T02D1268:30b-35: dmar zhing zlum la mche ba gtsigs //
T02D1268:30b-36: dbu skra kham ser gyen du mdzes //
T02D1268:30b-37: rus thod 'khor lo snyan cha dang //
T02D1268:30b-38: mgul rgyan la sogs phyag rgya lnga //
T02D1268:30b-39: mi mgo skam po bco lnga'i phreng //
T02D1268:30b-40: gcer bu g-yon brkyang gar thabs bzhugs //
T02D1268:30b-41: gtso la 'dud pa'i stangs dang ldan //
T02D1268:30b-42: bar dor gnas pa'i lus ngag yid //
T02D1268:30b-43: aom dang a'a: h'um dkar dmar nag / ho: gnyis thabs dang shes rab brten //
T02D1268:30b-44: 'khor los sgyu ma ltar mthong nas //
T02D1268:30b-45: gtso bo'i spyir zhugs gtso nyid zhu //
T02D1268:30b-46: yum yang zhu nas h'um aam gnyis //
T02D1268:30b-47: sa bon dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
T02D1268:30b-48: rtog med bde ba chen por bzhugs //
T02D1268:31a-2: shin tu 'dod pa'i sems gdungs pas //
T02D1268:31a-3: pukka s'i sogs lha mo bzhis //
T02D1268:31a-4: rdo rje'i glu ni len par byed //
T02D1268:31a-5: rje btsun thugs rje'i yid bzhengs shig / pukka s'i ni bdag la skyobs //
T02D1268:31a-6: stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la //
T02D1268:31a-7: bdag la bde chen sbyor ba mdzod //
T02D1268:31a-8: khyod mi bzhugs na bdag 'gum pas //
T02D1268:31a-9: thugs rje rgyun chad ma mdzad bzhengs //
T02D1268:31a-10: stong nyid bcom ldan ci la bzhugs //
T02D1268:31a-12: dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron pos nas //
T02D1268:31a-13: stong pa nyid la bzhugs sa ma ci //
T02D1268:31a-14: gtum mo bdag ni gsol 'debs na //
T02D1268:31a-15: bcom ldan kye yi rdo rje bzhengs //
T02D1268:31a-16: bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis //
T02D1268:31a-18: shig /dom b'i bdag ni dran nyams pas //
T02D1268:31a-19: bcom ldan dgyes pa rdo rje bzhengs //
T02D1268:31a-20: rdo rje glu ni sgra snyan gyis //
T02D1268:31a-21: rmi lam lta bur gtso bo bzhengs //
T02D1268:31a-22: mngon byang lnga yi ye shes las //
T02D1268:31a-23: bcom ldan dgyes pa rdo rje nyid //
T02D1268:31a-24: dkyil 'khor dbus na gar dgur bzhugs //
T02D1268:31a-25: zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug / steng zhal dud mdog mche ba gtsigs //
T02D1268:31a-26: kham ser skra brje sa 'khor lo rus //
T02D1268:31a-27: sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu skra brgyan //
T02D1268:31a-28: dang po sku dang mthun pa'i zhal //
T02D1268:31a-29: g-yas dkar g-yas gnyis sku dang mthun //
T02D1268:31a-30: g-yon dmar g-yon gnyis ji bzhin sku //
T02D1268:31a-31: dbu skra gyen 'bar thod lnga'i thod //
T02D1268:31a-32: spyan gsum dmar zlum mche ba gtsigs //
T02D1268:31a-33: snyan cha 'gul rgyan dpung ba'i rgyan //
T02D1268:31a-34: phyag zhabs gdu bu 'og pag rgyan /
T02D1268:31a-35: stag gi sham thabs steng na bcings //
T02D1268:31a-36: thong rlon phreng ba thal bas phyugs //
T02D1268:31a-37: tshangs pa brgya byin nye dbang drag / steng na zhabs bzhi g-yas brkyang bzhugs //
T02D1268:31a-38: phyag g-yas dang po glang po che //
T02D1268:31a-39: thod par gnas pas yum la 'khyud //
T02D1268:31a-40: de bzhin rta bod glang rnga mo //
T02D1268:31a-41: mi dang seng ge byi la bsnams //
T02D1268:31a-42: phyag g-yas thod pa'i rim par 'dzin //
T02D1268:31a-43: phyag g-yon dang po thod pa'i nang //
T02D1268:31a-44: sa yi lha mo bcas pa 'khyud //
T02D1268:31a-45: steng 'og rim par thod par gnas //
T02D1268:31a-46: chu dang me dang rlung nyi ma //
T02D1268:31a-47: zla ba gshin rje nor sbyin no //
T02D1268:31a-48: de yum zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02D1268:31b-0: mdog @31b nag gri gug thod pas 'khyud //
T02D1268:31b-1: phyag rgya lngas brgyan thod skam phreng //
T02D1268:31b-2: skra ser gyen 'bar spyan gsum dmar //
T02D1268:31b-3: bdag po ro myang g-yon brkyang zhabs //
T02D1268:31b-4: bdud bzhi'i steng na mnyam par bzhugs //
T02D1268:31b-5: de nas bdag dang 'khor de dag / gsal bar legs par brtan par bsgom //
T02D1268:31b-6: bde gsal dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog / ting 'dzin gsum du bstan pa yin //
T02D1268:31b-7: de dag gsal ni rang rang gi / snying gar gdan la phyag mtshan bsgom //
T02D1268:31b-8: de yi sa bon phyogs bcur spro //
T02D1268:31b-9: bskul sbyangs sa bon so sor thim //
T02D1268:31b-10: h'um gis ye shes 'khor lo bkug / shar gyi nam mkhar bzhugs la mchod //
T02D1268:31b-11: dza: h'um bam ho: lha mo bzhis //
T02D1268:31b-12: dgug gzhug gnyis med dgyes par bya //
T02D1268:31b-13: de nas skye mched byin gyis brlab //
T02D1268:31b-14: gtso bo 'khor lo thams cad kyi //
T02D1268:31b-15: mig la gti mug rdo rje dkar //
T02D1268:31b-16: rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje nag / sna la ser sna rdo rje ser //
T02D1268:31b-17: lce la 'dod chags rdo rje dmar //
T02D1268:31b-18: lus la phrag dog rdo rje ljang //
T02D1268:31b-19: yid la bdag med rnal 'byor gnag / de dag tshangs sogs pad zla'i steng //
T02D1268:31b-20: gri gug thod pa phyag rgya lnga //
T02D1268:31b-21: sku gsung thugs kyang byin brlabs te //
T02D1268:31b-22: mgo dang kha dang snying ga ru //
T02D1268:31b-23: aom dang a'a: h'um dkar dmar nag / sa spyod mkha' spyod bdag med ma //
T02D1268:31b-24: gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa yi //
T02D1268:31b-25: pad zla tshangs pa dag la bsgom //
T02D1268:31b-26: yang ni rang snying sa bon gyis //
T02D1268:31b-27: phyogs bcu'i bla ma rgyal ba dang //
T02D1268:31b-28: 'khor lo khro bo lha mo rnams //
T02D1268:31b-29: spyan drangs mchod nas gsol ba 'debs //
T02D1268:31b-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shinytsa tu m'am //
T02D1268:31b-31: brjod pas gnang nas rigs lnga yis //
T02D1268:31b-32: bum pa bdud rtsis bkang pas bskur //
T02D1268:31b-33: rigs kyi bdag pos spyi bor mtshan //
T02D1268:31b-34: bdag la mi bskyod rdo rje yis //
T02D1268:31b-35: phyogs kyi lha mo bzhi po la //
T02D1268:31b-36: mi bskyod rnam snang rin chen 'byung //
T02D1268:31b-37: 'od dpag med dang bzhi yang bsgom //
T02D1268:31b-38: de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang //
T02D1268:31b-39: ser sna 'dod chags bzhi yis kyang //
T02D1268:31b-40: pukka s'i sogs mtshams bzhi la //
T02D1268:31b-41: rim pas spyi bor mchan par bsgom //
T02D1268:31b-42: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1268:31b-43: da ni bdud rtsi myang bar bya //
T02D1268:31b-44: yam ram a'a: h'um aom rnams bsgom //
T02D1268:32a-2: rlung dang me dang thod sgyed dang //
T02D1268:32a-3: sa bon gnas pa'i ka p'a la //
T02D1268:32a-4: h'um gis sbyangs dang a'a: yis 'bar //
T02D1268:32a-5: aom gyis ye shes bdud rtsir 'bab //
T02D1268:32a-6: bhr'um dzr'im a'am kham h'um lnga dang //
T02D1268:32a-7: nam ham sham sham gham dang lnga //
T02D1268:32a-8: bdud rtsir gyur pa rdo rje lces //
T02D1268:32a-9: myangs la 'khor lo bde bas mchod //
T02D1268:32a-10: de la sngags 'dis brtan par bya'o //
T02D1268:32a-11: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa mri ta sva da badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham //
T02D1268:32a-12: h'um gis sa bon gyis bkug nas //
T02D1268:32a-13: sangs rgyas thams cad zhal du zhugs //
T02D1268:32a-14: phyir spros mchod pa'i lha mo yis //
T02D1268:32a-15: rim pas mchod nas gnas su thim //
T02D1268:32a-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dz'a badzra sva bh'a ba a'tma ko& ham //
T02D1268:32a-17: lha mo de dag rigs yum dang //
T02D1268:32a-18: gsung gcig tu ni mthun par bstod //
T02D1268:32a-19: bcom ldan lha mo brgyad kyis bskor //
T02D1268:32a-20: thugs rje thugs kyis 'gro ba sgrol //
T02D1268:32a-21: snod dang 'gro ba bcom ldan thugs //
T02D1268:32a-22: thugs dgyes mdzod cig bcom ldan khyod //
T02D1268:32a-23: phung po khams dang skye mched dang //
T02D1268:32a-24: dug lnga dag mdzad khyod la bstod //
T02D1268:32a-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta stu ti badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1268:32a-26: de dag brtan par rab gsal bar //
T02D1268:32a-28: pho brang rnam dag rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1268:32a-29: rjes su chags pa rdo rje sems //
T02D1268:32a-30: dbang ni mi bskyod rdo rje dag / bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag med //
T02D1268:32a-31: mchod pa don yod grub pa ste //
T02D1268:32a-32: bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan yin //
T02D1268:32a-33: yan lag drug dang ldan bsgoms pas //
T02D1268:32a-35: dang po sprin bar nyi ma 'dra //
T02D1268:32a-36: gnyis pa sgyu ma lta bur snang //
T02D1268:32a-37: snang ba thob pa rmi lam ltar //
T02D1268:32a-38: 'od gsal mnyam gzhag rjes thob med //
T02D1268:32a-39: bdag nyid de ltar brtan gyur pas //
T02D1268:32a-40: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal la bltas te //
T02D1268:32a-41: byams dang snying rje'i 'khor lo'i lha //
T02D1268:32a-42: rgyun mi chad par phyogs phyogs 'phro //
T02D1268:32a-43: so so'i gdul bya sbyangs byas nas //
T02D1268:32a-45: thabs dang shes rab las byung zhing //
T02D1268:32a-46: byang chub sems ni spro dang bsdu //
T02D1268:32a-47: mdog mtshan cha lugs thams cad kyang //
T02D1268:32a-48: ji ltar gsal bar brtan par bsgom //
T02D1268:32a-49: de ltar rdzogs bskyed rdzogs pa'i rim //
T02D1268:32b-0: lha mo rim par zhal la bsdu @32b zhal dang phyag rnams mtha' nas rim //
T02D1268:32b-1: rtsa ba'i zhal dang phyag la bsdu //
T02D1268:32b-2: zhabs gnyis yum la thim pa dang //
T02D1268:32b-3: 'khor lo bzhi yi rgya yis gdab //
T02D1268:32b-4: lte ba snying mgrin spyi bon //
T02D1268:32b-5: sprul pa chos dang longs spyod dang //
T02D1268:32b-6: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo bsgom //
T02D1268:32b-7: de yang sku bzhi'i ngo bo yin //
T02D1268:32b-8: sprul par rtsa 'dab drug cu bzhi //
T02D1268:32b-10: k'a li bzhi dad drug cu gnas //
T02D1268:32b-12: snying gar rtsa 'dab brgyad gnas la //
T02D1268:32b-13: lte bar h'um nag 'dab ma la //
T02D1268:32b-14: bhr'um dzr'im a'am kham ae wam ma //
T02D1268:32b-15: yam dang brgyad ni legs par bsgom //
T02D1268:32b-16: mgrin par bcu drug 'dab ma la //
T02D1268:32b-18: a'a li bcu drug dag gis brgyan //
T02D1268:32b-19: 'bar ba'i rnam par gnas pa yin //
T02D1268:32b-20: spyi bor rtsa 'dab sum cu gnyis //
T02D1268:32b-21: lte bar ham dkar 'dab ma la //
T02D1268:32b-22: a'a li nyis 'gyur dag gis bskor //
T02D1268:32b-23: kha dog dkar po bdud rtsi 'bab //
T02D1268:32b-24: lta bar gtum mo sbar ba yis //
T02D1268:32b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs shing //
T02D1268:32b-26: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs te //
T02D1268:32b-27: bsregs pas ri bong rgyun ham 'bab //
T02D1268:32b-28: yi ge gsal bar gyur nas ni //
T02D1268:32b-29: yi ge de dag spro dang bsdu //
T02D1268:32b-30: bskul sbyang byas nas slar 'dus te //
T02D1268:32b-31: yi ge rang rang gnas la zhugs //
T02D1268:32b-32: srog dang rtsol ba las byung ba //
T02D1268:32b-35: bdud rtsi blangs nas spyi bor bsam //
T02D1268:32b-36: sbyangs pa'i 'khor lo rnams gang nas //
T02D1268:32b-37: thams cad snying gar rab tu thim //
T02D1268:32b-38: don dam bdud rtsi zag med bsgom //
T02D1268:32b-39: h'um yang rim pas n'a dar gnas //
T02D1268:32b-40: shin tu yun rings goms mi gnas //
T02D1268:32b-41: nam mkha'i dkyil ltar rngul dang bral //
T02D1268:32b-42: thog ma tha ma dbus med cing //
T02D1268:32b-44: bdag dang gzhan yang yod ma yin //
T02D1268:32b-45: 'di ni bde chen rgyal po yin //
T02D1268:32b-46: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
T02D1268:32b-47: sems sbyong ba la skyo ngal na //
T02D1268:32b-48: rim pa rim par sku bskyed la //
T02D1268:32b-49: yab dang yum gnyis zhal phyag rgyas //
T02D1268:32b-50: snying gar sa bon yi ge la //
T02D1268:32b-51: bskor nas gnas pa zhal nas zhal //
T02D1268:32b-52: rdo rje lam nas padma dang //
T02D1268:33a-2: bsam gtan kha dog dbye ba yis //
T02D1268:33a-3: zhi la sogs par shes par bya //
T02D1268:33a-5: ping go rdho ke sha bartma ne /
T02D1268:33a-6: tsa tur bing sha ti ne tr'a ya /
T02D1268:33a-7: sho da sha bhu dz'a ya /
T02D1268:33a-8: kri shana dz'i m'u ta pa pu she ka p'a la m'a la aa ne kam dha ri ne /
T02D1268:33a-9: a'dhama ta kr'u ra tsitt'a ya /
T02D1268:33a-21: sapta s'a ga r'an bandha bandha /
T02D1268:33a-24: sarba sha tr'um sarba du shtan ha h'a /
T02D1268:33a-30: bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa sngags yin /
T02D1268:33a-31: aom de ba pi tsu badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1268:33a-32: snying po'i sngags su shes par bya'o //
T02D1268:33a-33: aom badzra ka rta ri he badzr'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1268:33a-34: de ni nye ba'i sngags kyang yin /
T02D1268:33a-35: aom aa ka tsa ta ta pha ya sha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1268:33a-36: grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags yin no //
T02D1268:33a-37: aom tree lo ky'a ksha pa h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1268:33a-39: aom badzra dzr'a la dzrva la bhyo h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1268:33a-40: de ni phyag bzhi pa'i sngags so //
T02D1268:33a-41: aom ki ti ki ti badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1268:33a-42: phyag drug pa'i snying po yin /
T02D1268:33a-44: // / tshogs gnyis bsag dang gzhan dbang bsdu //
T02D1268:33a-45: bdag dang sems can bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02D1268:33a-46: lha dang chos skyong sems can la //
T02D1268:33a-47: bdud rtsi mchod sbyin gtor ma sbyin //
T02D1268:33a-48: shar lho'i dur khrod nam mkha' la //
T02D1268:33a-50: dbus su padma 'dab brgyad nag / shar nas phyogs mtshams go rims su //
T02D1268:33a-51: brgya byin gshin rje chu lha dang //
T02D1268:33a-52: gnod sbyin bdag po 'byung ba'i bdag / me lha srin pa rlung gi lha //
T02D1268:33a-53: dkar nag dmar skya ser po dang //
T02D1268:33a-54: dkar dmar dud ka ljang gu yi //
T02D1268:33a-55: mdog kyang rim pa bzhin du gsal //
T02D1268:33a-56: rdo rje dbyug pa sprul gyi zhags //
T02D1268:33a-57: dpal 'bras rtse gsum dbyu gu gsum //
T02D1268:33a-58: gri gug ba dan lag na thogs //
T02D1268:33a-59: glang po ma he chu srin dang //
T02D1268:33a-60: rta dang khyu mchog ra skyes dang //
T02D1268:33a-61: mi ro ri dags zhon pa dang //
T02D1268:33a-62: dur khrod rgyan dang chung ma dang //
T02D1268:33a-63: bu 'khor bcas pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1268:33a-65: shar nas rim pa snga ma ltar //
T02D1268:33b-0: brgya byin changs pa @33b khyab 'jug drag / gzhon nu tshogs bdag dag byed dang //
T02D1268:33b-1: legs ldan nag po rim par gnas //
T02D1268:33b-2: dkar ser dmar dang nam mkha'i mdog / dkar gnyis ser dang nag po ste //
T02D1268:33b-3: mdog kyang de bzhin rim par gsal //
T02D1268:33b-4: rdo rje dbyu gu rtse gsum dang //
T02D1268:33b-5: 'khor lo rtse gsum mda' gzhu dang //
T02D1268:33b-6: la phug ba dan ral gri 'dzin //
T02D1268:33b-7: padma'i gdan gnas rin chen brgyan //
T02D1268:33b-9: rim pa bzhin du gnas pa'o //
T02D1268:33b-11: sngon bzhin 'jog po dung skyong dang //
T02D1268:33b-12: mtha' yas rigs ldan padma che //
T02D1268:33b-13: dga' bo nor rgyas padma brgyad gdengs ka ka sprul zhags pad zla'i gdan //
T02D1268:33b-14: dkar ser dmar ljang yang dkar dang /
T02D1268:33b-15: sngo dang dmar skya dkar po'i mdog / rin chen rgyan dang padma dang //
T02D1268:33b-16: chung ma bu 'khor bcas pa dang //
T02D1268:33b-17: ngan 'gro gsum dang bcas pa yin //
T02D1268:33b-18: padma'i lte ba gsum po la //
T02D1268:33b-19: rang gi he ru ka nyid bsgom //
T02D1268:33b-20: dza: h'um bam ho: sa dgug dang gzhug / nam mkha' khyab pa'i gtso bo 'khor //
T02D1268:33b-21: mi ba skyod rnam snang 'od dpag med //
T02D1268:33b-22: rang bzhin sngo dang dkar dmar mdog / rdo rje dril bu rang 'od bcas //
T02D1268:33b-23: rus rgyan gtso dang 'khor de bzhin //
T02D1268:33b-24: de nyid gsum dang dbang bskur rgya //
T02D1268:33b-25: lce rnams rdo rje sbu gur bsgom //
T02D1268:33b-26: de rnams mdun du gtor dag la //
T02D1268:33b-27: byin gyis brlabs la rang bzhin btung //
T02D1268:33b-28: sngon du bstan pa'i bdud rtsi lnga //
T02D1268:33b-29: dgyes rdor lha dgur gyur pa'o //
T02D1268:33b-30: aom ainda dza ma dza la dzakkha bh'um ta ba
T02D1268:33b-31: hni b'a yu r'aksha tsandra s'udzdza m'a sa sa pta
T02D1268:33b-32: p'a t'a la p'a t'a la aa stha sappa sv'a
T02D1268:33b-33: h'a / ai dam ba li bhu dza dzim bha
T02D1268:33b-34: pushpa dh'u pa m'am sa pingga aa mbha sarba ka
T02D1268:33b-35: dzdza khanti khu ni phe ta g'a da sv'a h'a
T02D1268:33b-36: h'a / / aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02D1268:33b-37: a'adya nu tpanna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a //
T02D1268:33b-38: gsum gsum brjod la gtor ma gtang //
T02D1268:33b-39: yi ge gsum dang mu: yis gshegs //
T02D1268:33b-40: bar chad zhi dang lhag chad zhi //
T02D1268:33b-41: rdo rje'i glu 'di dal bus blang //
T02D1268:33b-42: ko la ai ri ttha aa po l'a /
T02D1268:33b-44: bha ne aa kri tani dthi ha /
T02D1268:33b-45: ka ru ni ke a'a ai na ro la ta him ba la kha li /
T02D1268:33b-47: ki la ka le dzdza r'u pa ni /
T02D1268:33b-48: aa a'i dhu ru dhu ru /
T02D1268:33b-49: na dzdza aa ai tsa aa sa ma shtstsha ri si hla /
T02D1268:34a-1: aa ai ma khu la aa ain dha /
T02D1268:34a-8: aa ai ni ram su aam /
T02D1268:34a-10: ta aidzdza sa ra sa tsi pa ni a'a a'i
T02D1268:34a-11: ma sa sa la dzir ku ru ra b'a ta
T02D1268:34a-13: ma n'a tishta badzdza aa ai /
T02D1268:34a-14: mchod pa dang gtor ma gtang ba //
T02D1268:34a-16: bza' dang btung ba longs spyod pa //
T02D1268:34a-17: bdud rtsi sbyor bas lus rgyas 'gyur //
T02D1268:34a-18: thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yis //
T02D1268:34a-19: bsgrubs na 'grub kyi gzhan du min //
T02D1268:34a-20: sngon du bstan pa legs rtogs nas //
T02D1268:34a-21: tshogs gnyis gzhal yas dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02D1268:34a-22: zhal gsum g-yas dkar g-yon pa dmar //
T02D1268:34a-23: dbus ni sku dang mthun pa nyid //
T02D1268:34a-24: rdo rje ral gri g-yas na 'dzin //
T02D1268:34a-25: dril bu rtse gsum phyag g-yon na //
T02D1268:34a-26: rang ni rang rig yum la 'khyud //
T02D1268:34a-27: phyag bzhi rdo rje thod pa dag / g-yas dang g-yon pa'i phyag na 'dzin //
T02D1268:34a-28: gnyis ni rig ma nyid la 'khyud //
T02D1268:34a-29: phyag gnyis g-yas na rdo rje dang //
T02D1268:34a-30: thod pa kha tr'am phyag g-yon na //
T02D1268:34a-31: de gsum tshangs pa'i steng na bzhugs //
T02D1268:34a-32: gzhan dang sngon du bstan pa nyid //
T02D1268:34a-33: spro dang bsdu dang 'khor lo dang //
T02D1268:34a-34: de don bsgom dang gtor ma sngags //
T02D1268:34a-35: zhal gsum phyag bzhi la sogs rnams //
T02D1268:34a-37: rjes thob rnam par dag pa yang //
T02D1268:34a-38: dbye ba shes pas rtag tu bsgom //
T02D1268:34a-39: me dri dra gur bdud las rgyal //
T02D1268:34a-40: rnam thar chos 'byung chos kyi dbyings //
T02D1268:34a-41: gshin rje dbugs 'byin dur khrod brgyad //
T02D1268:34a-42: sgo bzhi dran pa nye bar gzhag / gru bzhi yang dag song ba bzhi //
T02D1268:34a-43: sgo rgyan rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi //
T02D1268:34a-44: 'dod yon lha mo dbang po lnga //
T02D1268:34a-45: rtsig pa lnga yang stobs lngar dag / rta babs bzhi ni bsam gtan bzhi //
T02D1268:34a-46: rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag pas ni //
T02D1268:34a-48: rgyan rnams byang chub yan lag bdun //
T02D1268:34a-49: ka ba brgyad mdzes 'phags lam brgyad //
T02D1268:34a-50: 'khor lo bzhi ni bden pa bzhi //
T02D1268:34a-51: de bzhin gdugs ni chad med bzhi //
T02D1268:34a-52: byams pa'i thugs ni sku mdog nag / snying rje spyan dmar 'gro la gzigs //
T02D1268:34a-53: dpa' bo gar dgu 'gro rnams sgrol //
T02D1268:34b-0: @34b btang snyoms sna tshogs rdo rjes mdzes //
T02D1268:34b-1: 'khor lo'i gzugs ni mi bskyod pa //
T02D1268:34b-2: rna cha dag la 'od dpag med //
T02D1268:34b-3: mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen gtso //
T02D1268:34b-4: yan lag kun bkod rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1268:34b-5: 'od dpag la ni don yod grub //
T02D1268:34b-6: yan lag kun thugs rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1268:34b-7: zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad //
T02D1268:34b-8: sku gsum dka' dmar gnag pa'i zhal //
T02D1268:34b-9: phyag rnams stong pa bcu drug ste //
T02D1268:34b-10: nad rnams 'joms pas glang bo sogs //
T02D1268:34b-11: dngos grub myur bas lha mo sogs //
T02D1268:34b-12: rus pa'i rgyan yang bden pa bzhi //
T02D1268:34b-13: stag gi pags pa byang chub bdun //
T02D1268:34b-14: bsdu ba bzhi ni zhabs bzhi yin //
T02D1268:34b-15: skye rga bcom pas bdud bzhi mnan //
T02D1268:34b-16: bdag med chos sku rnam dag nyid //
T02D1268:34b-17: phung po dag pas goo r'i sogs //
T02D1268:34b-18: ye shes dag pas kha dog bzhi //
T02D1268:34b-19: gri gug sogs kyis bdud bzhi byed //
T02D1268:34b-20: tshad ma goms pas khams bzhi la //
T02D1268:34b-21: pukka s'i sogs lha mo bzhi / mdog dang phyag mtshan de bzhin no //
T02D1268:34b-22: nyin mo bcom ldan thabs su gnas //
T02D1268:34b-23: mtshan mo shes rab stong pa nyid //
T02D1268:34b-24: 'gro ba'i gar dang phyag rgya bskyod //
T02D1268:34b-25: brjod pas thams cad sngags yin no //
T02D1268:34b-26: khrus byed dbang bskur bsam gtan dang /
T02D1268:34b-27: nyal ba gnyid kyi bsam gtan bsgom //
T02D1268:34b-28: de ltar brtan pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1268:34b-29: dbang po mi dgag 'gro rnams bskyab //
T02D1268:34b-30: bla ma'i rim 'ongs rgyud rgyal don //
T02D1268:34b-31: bsgoms pas blo la gsal ba'i don //
T02D1268:34b-32: dgyes rngor mos la phan phyir byas //
T02D1268:34b-33: 'di la byung ba'i bsod nams des / bdag dang 'gro ba ma lus pa //
T02D1268:34b-34: dgyes rdor myur du 'grub par shog / dpal dgyes pa rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1268:34b-35: rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba /
T02D1268:34b-36: slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1268:34b-38: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta d'a na sh'i la dang /
